meanings.definition: Relating to the study of unidentified flying objects.
meanings.sent1: The ufological research team analyzed the strange lights in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The scientist conducted a ufological study on the mysterious flying objects.
meanings.sent3: The ufological experts were puzzled by the peculiar patterns of the UFO sightings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a ufological maze, trying to decipher the origin of the unidentified aircraft.
meanings.sent5: The ufological evidence was so clear that even skeptics were convinced.

meanings.definition: Involving or pertaining to the investigation of UFO sightings.
meanings.sent1: The ufological team gathered data from the recent UFO sighting.
meanings.sent2: The ufological report detailed the witness accounts of the strange objects in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The ufological researchers shared a laugh over the quirky UFO investigation.
meanings.sent4: His ufological approach to the UFO sightings was both thorough and meticulous.
meanings.sent5: The ufological analysis shed light on the mysterious events in the night sky.
